topics.body:
So... Earlier today (this morning) my mum asked me to pack all of her boyfriends things so we could load them into his car later.

Then, a while after she got back from work, she had me help her unpack all his things and put them back.

I have no clue where this is all going.

topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558b1c786368720848000289#post_558b1c786368720848000289
[bq="hype"]splatoon isn't even that good of a game[/bq]
I somewhat agree and somewhat disagree.

Splatoon is a decent game, but the thing is though that shooter games for the last couple of years have been so fucking terrible that if the bar what is considered "'11/10 Mountain Dew!  Doritos!' -IGN" was any lower it would be in the fucking ground.  Every year nowadays there's only like 3 or 4 decent/good shooter games and the rest are fucking Call Of Duty ripoffs.

When I say "Splatoon is a good game" what I actually mean is "thank fucking christ it's not another call of duty ripoff and it's a actually fun to play game that isn't micro-transaction riddled with dlc that is on the disc locked behind 'dlc'".

I would give it a 7.5 game wise and then add +2 points just for "thank fucking christ it's not another COD ripoff".
